Your registration for the membership will happen only when you complete the payment process. Please proceed to make an online payment by clicking on the payment button below. We thank you for your interest in DCP workshops.
CANON 100 – 400 MM F/4.5 – 5.6 IS II, EF

Versatile, portable super-telephoto zoom lens. Superb image quality right across the frame. Prevent camera shake with a 4-stop Image Stabilizer. Customise the feel of the zoom control for different situations. Fast, near-silent focusing. Shoot confidently in tough weather conditions.
Your transaction is successful. For your order id: 12345

The initiative of DCP online tutorials aims at bringing the state of the art photography learning to the comfort of your home. It is also our objective to make these tutorials available to you at an extremely affordable price.
₹ 2500/- per head inclusive of all taxes
1.All cancellations before 30 days of the event date- 100% refund
2.All cancellations between 20–30 days of the event date- 50% refund
3.All cancellations within 20 days of de event date- no refund possible

Android Radio Button A radio button consists of two states – checked and unchecked. Clicking an unchecked button changes its state to “checked” state and “unchecked” for the previously selected radio button. To toggle a checked state to unchecked state, we need to chose another item. Clicking a checked state button doesn’t do any good. A RadioGroup is a set of radio buttons. Radio Buttons that have different parent ViewGroup can’t be termed as a RadioGroup.Android Radio Button A radio button consists of two states – checked and unchecked. Clicking an unchecked button changes its state to “checked” state and “unchecked” for the previously selected radio button. To toggle a checked state to unchecked state, we need to chose another item. Clicking a checked state button doesn’t do any good. A RadioGroup is a set of radio buttons. Radio Buttons that have different parent ViewGroup can’t be termed as a RadioGroup.Android Radio Button A radio button consists of two states – checked and unchecked. Clicking an unchecked button changes its state to “checked” state and “unchecked” for the previously selected radio button. To toggle a checked state to unchecked state, we need to chose another item. Clicking a checked state button doesn’t do any good. A RadioGroup is a set of radio buttons. Radio Buttons that have different parent ViewGroup can’t be termed as a RadioGroup.

We need to understand more about the equipment you use. This helps us to guide you better. Write the name of your camera model and the lens you wish to use for this workshop in the fields below. We also have an equipment rental service. If you wish to avail this service, Please mention the equipment if you wish to rent from us
